channel.title: Vmware on monkeydri blog
channel.description: Recent content in Vmware on monkeydri blog

item.title: Virtual Machine Compatibility
item.description: https://www.eevblog.com/forum/altium/will-altium-17-run-in-virtualbox-or-vmware-on-a-linux-host/ solidworks PCB keeps opening new instance rather than open PCBdoc inside : https://forum.solidworks.com/thread/28754#128290 Vmware 3D acceleration support for intel HD graphics on ubuntu needs to add line to either ~/.vmware/preferences.ini or to the vmx fie itself : mks.gl.allowBlacklistedDrivers = "TRUE" source : https://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2368057 & https://askubuntu.com/questions/537787/enable-3d-hw-acceleration-on-vmware-workstation-10-on-ubuntu-14-04 altium 18 on virtualbox requires DirectX 10 : This version of Altium Designer’s PCB editor has been optimized for use with DirectX 10, and requires a graphics card that supports this
